faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our surfskate hall

items.question: How do I receive my access PIN?
items.answer: After a successful payment, you will automatically receive your PIN by email together with your booking confirmation.

items.question: What equipment is included in the price?
items.answer: Helmet, knee pads, wrist guards and a surfskate board are included. You only need to bring sportswear.

items.question: Can I cancel my booking?
items.answer: Yes. Cancellations are possible up to 24 hours before the start time. After that, refunds are not available.

items.question: Are there age restrictions?
items.answer: Recommended from 12 years. Minors require parental consent.

items.question: What happens if there are technical issues?
items.answer: Please contact our support via email or phone and we will help you right away.
